pkgmetadata.longdescription: Metabolomics Univariate and Multivariate Analysis // Preprocessing of high-throughput data (normalization and scalings); Principal Component Analysis with help tool for choosing best-separating principal components and automatic testing for outliers; automatic univariate analysis for parametric and non-parametric data, with generation of specific reports (volcano and box plots); partial least square discriminant analysis (PLS-DA); orthogonal partial least square discriminant analysis (OPLS-DA); Statistical Total Correlation Spectroscopy (STOCSY); Ratio Analysis Nuclear Magnetic Resonance (NMR) Spectroscopy (RANSY).
